channel.title: NMS:EQIX on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:EQIX on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Activist Elliott Boosts Stake in Data Center REIT Equinix
item.description: Elliott Investment Management has built up its stake in Equinix Inc. and is pushing the data center operator to take steps to boost its share price, people with knowledge of the matter said.
